tasks.name: Get Dressed
tasks.details: Fully dressed with socks and clean underwear.

tasks.name: Brush Hair
tasks.details: Brush your hair to get rid of tangles.

tasks.name: Pack Backpack
tasks.details: Put lunch and folder in backpack.

tasks.name: Dress for Outside
tasks.details: Put on shoes, coat, winter gear, etc.

tasks.name: Hang Backpack
tasks.details: Make sure you backpack is put away.

tasks.name: Hang Coat etc.
tasks.details: Make sure shoes, coat, etc. are put away.

tasks.name: Empty Lunch Bag
tasks.details: Empty lunch bag and place by stairs.

tasks.name: Check HW Folder
tasks.details: Look in your folder and show to mom/dad.

tasks.name: Get in Car
tasks.details: Get in the car to pickup dad first time asked.

tasks.name: Stay in Seat
tasks.details: Remain in your seat during dinner.

tasks.name: Clean Up Dishes
tasks.details: Bring your dishes to the sink or dishwasher.

tasks.name: Get Drink
tasks.details: Get some water for by your bed.

tasks.name: Calmly Sleep
tasks.details: Calmly stay in bed and listen to dad/mom.
